data.pricing_trends: Airfare generally peaks during winter holidays and summer vacations. Domestic travel rates are variable based on tourist season.
data.booking_windows: Recommended to book 1-3 months in advance for the best rates, especially for the high season.
data.demand: There is consistent interest in eco-tourism and cultural experiences, leading to increased flight bookings for Guatemala.
data.competition: Competing with countries like Costa Rica and Mexico for eco-adventures and cultural tourism.
